name: Eighty/20 Results - Annual Pricing Choice for Paid Memberships Pro
author: Thomas Sjolshagen <thomas@eighty20results.com>

sections.description: Allow selecting annual or monthly payment, if Membership levels are configured to support it
sections.changelog:
This change log contains information about the updates/modifications/fixes created for this add-on.

1.2

  1. ENH/BUG: Handle excluded membership levels that use annual payment
  2. ENH: Split annual/monthly selectable membership levels from the other membership level(s)

1.1

  1. ENH: Update CSS for backend
  2. ENH: Add build tools for Plugin
  3. ENH: Included GPL2 license text
  4. ENH: Added one-click update support
  5. ENH: Update version number (1.1)
  6. BUG: Didn't handle updates of options properly
  7. BUG: Clean up backend settings
sections.faq:
I found a bug in the plugin.

Please report your issue to us by using the Support Forum on The Eighty / 20 Website, where we try to respond within 1 business day.
